channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ChatGPT and Sora went down for the second time this month
item.description: ChatGPT, Sora, and OpenAI’s developer-facing API were down on Thursday for more than four hours. OpenAI says it started experiencing a major outage at...

item.title: DeepSeek’s new AI model appears to be one of the best ‘open’ challengers yet
item.description: DeepSeek V3 can handle a range of text-based workloads and tasks, like coding, translating, and writing essays and emails from a descriptive prompt. ©...

item.title: The Year of the AI Election Wasn’t Quite What Everyone Expected
item.description: Deepfakes were nothing like the political force in 2024 that many feared—but that doesn’t mean that generative AI didn’t profoundly affect elections a...

item.title: Beyond Meat Says Being Attacked Has Just Made It Stronger
item.description: The plant-based-meat company’s CEO, Ethan Brown, credits a series of attack ads with prompting a potentially sector-saving change of plan.

item.title: ChatGPT Search can be tricked into misleading users, new research reveals
item.description: ChatGPT's new search feature can be told to generate entirely positive product summaries thanks to hidden code, new research finds. © 2024 TechCrunch....

item.title: The Year Villainy Won
item.description: Villains were everywhere and more relatable than ever. Across pop culture, social media, and IRL, the phenomenon went full-on main character.

item.title: The Best Tested and Reviewed Mesh Wi-Fi Routers of 2024
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: Samsung HW-Q990D Review: Atmos Tested, Gamer Approved
item.description: Samsung’s celebrated flagship soundbar does just enough to beat out the rest of its Dolby Atmos competitors.

item.title: Watch this robotic ‘Superman Suit’ rotate around a gymnastics bar
item.description: Scientists at the Suzumori Endo Robotics lab in Tokyo have developed the Superman Suit: a suit powered by hydraulic artificial muscles that allow it t...

item.title: AI sales rep startups are booming. So why are VCs wary?
item.description: When you really probe venture capitalists about investing in AI startups, they’ll tell you that businesses are experimenting wildly but are very slow ...
